text: hi y’all! I’d very much join in at the dev meetup, but I’m also attending partner day. Thinking of sharing my attention the day and attend both; to anyone concerned with the organization; would you be pissed off if I jump in an hour or two and leave again?
I would never speak to you again :zany_face:

Hello Everyone! Just as an update, the list of speakers for the event are now on the landing page. We are still working out the time slots as well as one of the topics but this should give you a better idea of what will be discussed at the event.
<https://devday.splashthat.com/>
